net.sf.freecol.client.gui.panel

Interface ColopediaDetailPanel<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BuildingDetailPanel, ColopediaGameObjectTypePanel, ConceptDetailPanel, FatherDetailPanel, GoodsDetailPanel, NationDetailPanel, NationTypeDetailPanel, ResourcesDetailPanel, TerrainDetailPanel, UnitDetailPanel

    public interface ColopediaDetailPanel<T>
    This panel displays the Colopedia.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSubTrees(javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode root)
      Adds one or several subtrees for all the objects for which this ColopediaDetailPanel could build a detail panel to the given root node.
      void buildDetail(java.lang.String id, javax.swing.JPanel panel)
      Builds the details panel for the given identifier.

    • Method Detail

      • addSubTrees

        void addSubTrees(javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode root)
        Adds one or several subtrees for all the objects for which this ColopediaDetailPanel could build a detail panel to the given root node.
        Parameters:
        root - a DefaultMutableTreeNode

      • buildDetail

        void buildDetail(java.lang.String id,
                 javax.swing.JPanel panel)
        Builds the details panel for the given identifier.
        Parameters:
        id - The object identifier to display.
        panel - the detail panel to build
